channel.title: TravelgateX Documentation â€“ Management
channel.description: Recent changes in Management on TravelgateX Documentation

item.title: Connectiontypessellers: Cancel
item.description:
Method Goals This method aims to cancel a booking Request Format The request requires one or more of the following data, depending on the supplier: Locators: booking codes - this element contains two elements, Client (client’s booking code) and Provider (supplier’s booking code). One or both will be required depending on the supplier hotelCode: the hotel code StartDate: the check-in date EndDate: the check-out date Response Format The result returns a response with the booking status, the cancellation’s ID and the fee for that cancellation.
[...]

item.title: Connectiontypessellers: ReservationList
item.description:
Method Goals This method aims to return a list of bookings for a given time period being that either booking date or the travelling date. Request Format The request requires one of the following data depending on provider: DateType: indicates the date type: either booking creation date or booking start date Start: the date from End: the date to Response Format The result returns a list of bookings details, with the same format as ReservationReadRS.
[...]

item.title: Connectiontypessellers: ReservationRead
item.description:
Method Goals This method aims to retrieve detailed information about a specific Reservation Request Format The request requires one of the following data depending on supplier: Locators: booking codes (this element contains two elements Client (client’s booking code) and Provider (supplier’s booking code), one or both will be required depending on the supplier) Currency: the currency code CreationDate: the booking date StardDate: the check-in date EndDate: the check-out date HotelCode: Hotel code Response Format The result returns the full details of a booking.
[...]
